column4: In 5G play  Vodafone and IBM link up cloud systems for business
column5: FRANKFURT  Jan 17 Vodafone is teaming up with IBM to offer businesses a way to link different cloud computing systems to support the next wave of digital advances  such as machine learning  on super-fast fifth-generation telecoms networks.

column4: Musk tweets Tesla to end customer referral plan because of costs
column5: Tesla Inc's  customer referral incentive plan will end on Feb. 1  the electric carmaker's Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk tweeted on Thursday  citing costs.

column4: TSMC offers gloomy revenue forecast  slams chipmaker shares
column5: TAIPEI Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd (TSMC) cut full-year investment and forecast its sharpest quarterly revenue fall in a decade  joining a string of tech companies warning of a slowdown in global smartphone demand.

column4: UPDATE 3-TSMC offers gloomy revenue forecast  slams chipmaker shares
column5: * Q4 revenue up 2 percent from a year ago (Adds chipmakers' share reaction)
